title: Pixel Watch wish list: Things we’d love to see on Google’s first wearable [Video]
content:
In 2022, it looks very much like we’ll finally see a Google-made smartwatch. It seems as though the Pixel Watch has been in the pipeline for a number of years, but all evidence points to a launch at some point this year. This is our Pixel Watch wish list.

more…

The post Pixel Watch wish list: Things we’d love to see on Google’s first wearable [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In 2022, Google is finally set to unveil it's first wearable, which has us dreaming up a Pixel watch wish list of things we'd love to see.
